Workload_Full_Display_Name: ImpactIQ Semantic Link Labs - Power BI & Fabric Governance
Workload_Description: Automated Power BI and Fabric governance solution with impact analysis and metadata extraction
Workload_Hub_Description: ImpactIQ provides comprehensive governance for Power BI and Fabric environments. Automatically analyze impact of changes, identify unused objects, discover broken visuals, and maintain complete visibility across all workspaces. Built on Semantic Link Labs for fast, reliable metadata extraction into Fabric Lakehouses.
Workload_Hub_GetStarted_1_Sub_Title: Get up and running in minutes
Workload_Hub_GetStarted_1_Description: Follow our step-by-step guide to set up ImpactIQ in your Fabric workspace. Create a Governance Analyzer item, connect to a Lakehouse, and start analyzing your Power BI environment immediately.
GovernanceAnalyzerItem_Description: Analyze Power BI reports and semantic models for impact, usage, and governance
